title: Kim Kardashian prepared to pee her pants at Met Gala due to tight dress
text:
Kim Kardashian has revealed the lengths she’ll go to for fashion, as she prepared to pee herself at this year’s Met Gala.

If you draw your attention to her May outfit, the reality TV star wore a custom-made, beaded, latex dress by Thierry Mugler for the annual Met Gala – a dress so skin-tight jaws dropped as people tried to work out how she moved, let alone breathed in the piece.

Now she’s revealed she was prepared to pee herself in order to go to the bathroom in the tight gown, in a behind the scenes of her fitting.

As the star wore her famous shapewear – as she launched her brand, Skims, recently – the 38-year-old stood, fresh-faced and with her hair tied back, and spoke with her team as to the plan of attack when the call of nature sounded.

‘If I have to pee, it’s a problem,’ she said.

Kim’s dress was amazing (Picture: Getty Images North America)

‘Honestly, if it’s an emergency, I think I pee my pants and then have my sister wipe my leg up.’

Advertisement

Completely straight-faced she continued: ‘I’m not even joking. She can wipe my leg up.’

Kim explained that in her 2018 Met Gala outfit the slit in her dress was so minimal she had to squat and essentially hope the wee made the toilet bowl.

It’s a great vision, right?

She had to take breathing lessons before fitting into the corset (Picture: Backgrid)

Following the annual fashion event in New York, the mother-of-four revealed she took breathing lessons in order to function and keep living while wearing the constricting couture.

Speaking about her Mugler-designed gown, she wrote on Instagram: ‘We met up in Miami right after the holidays last year and saw the sketches! I learned so much about couture from this genius man, it was beyond couture, it was art! 7 months in the making and fittings in Montreal, Paris and LA. Corset breathing lessons from none other than Mr. Pearl. It was worth it all!!!’

And Kim hinted that she is starting an exciting new collaboration with Mugler, writing: ‘And this was the start of a magical inspiring connection. Stay tuned for more.’

Kim’s Met Gala dressed showcased her tiny waist, which was achieved thanks to a custom-made, nude corset, with Spanx that stopped just above her knees.

And Kim revealed that it took three assistants to strap her into the bodysuit.

Advertisement

The corset squeezed Kim’s waist in to create that exaggerated hourglass figure, but while Kim was pleased with the results, to say she was comfortable would be a stretch.

Speaking in a BTS video of her Met Gala prep, she revealed that she couldn’t exactly sit in the dress.

She said: ‘So Anna [Wintour], if I don’t sit down for dinner, now you know why. I’ll be walking around, mingling, talking, but I can hardly sit. I can only half sit.’
